title: Tuta Mail adds new quantum-resistant encryption to protect email
description: Tuta Mail has announced TutaCrypt, a new post-quantum encryption protocol to secure communications from powerful and anticipated decryption attacks. [...]

title: Microsoft says Windows 10 21H2 support is ending in June
description: Microsoft announced today that it would end support for Windows 10 21H2 in June when the Enterprise and Education editions reach the end of service. [...]

title: Okta says data leaked on hacking forum not from its systems
description: Okta denies that its company data was leaked after a threat actor shared files allegedly stolen during an October 2023 cyberattack on a hacker forum. [...]

title: Researchers expose Microsoft SCCM misconfigs usable in cyberattacks
description: Security researchers have created a knowledge base repository for attack and defense techniques based on improperly setting up Microsoft's Configuration Manager, which could allow an attacker to execute payloads or become a domain controller. [...]

title: Equilend warns employees their data was stolen by ransomware gang
description: New York-based securities lending platform EquiLend Holdings confirmed in data breach notification letters sent to employees that their data was stolen in a January ransomware attack. [...]

title: Over 15,000 hacked Roku accounts sold for 50¢ each to buy hardware
description: Roku has disclosed a data breach impacting over 15,000 customers after hacked accounts were used to make fraudulent purchases of hardware and streaming subscriptions. [...]

title: Fake Leather wallet app on Apple App Store is a crypto drainer
description: The developers of the Leather cryptocurrency wallet are warning of a fake app on the Apple App Store, with users reporting it is a wallet drainer that stole their digital assets. [...]
